CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Event_Department__c , 'Retail') , '#04B404', IF(ISPICKVAL(Event_Department__c , 'Retail Development') , '#FACC2E', IF(ISPICKVAL(Event_Department__c , 'Leasing/Commercialisation') , '#FA5882', IF(ISPICKVAL(Event_Department__c , 'Combined Retail & Leasing') , '#BF00FF', IF(ISPICKVAL(Event_Department__c , 'Operations/Security') , '#F7BE81', IF(ISPICKVAL(Event_Department__c , 'Finance') , '#BFFF00', IF(ISPICKVAL(Event_Department__c , 'Marketing') , '#81F7F3', 'white')))))))
CustomField.label: Department Colour
